snippet: With limited information provided on judges running for a Supreme Court seat, voters may find it difficult to make an informed decision on election day.
lead_paragraph: With limited information provided on judges running for a Supreme Court seat, voters may find it difficult to make an informed decision on election day.

headline.seo: Need for More Thought In Electing Judges
headline.main: Need for More Thought in Electing Judges
headline.print_headline: Need for More Thought In Electing Judges
